name: lao-cinema-db
description: Database schema and migrations for Lao Cinema

scripts.db:migrate:test: export $(cat ../api/.env | grep -v '^#' | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && DATABASE_URL=$TEST_DATABASE_URL tsx src/migrate.ts
scripts.db:reset:test: PGPASSWORD=laocinema_dev dropdb --if-exists -h localhost -U laocinema lao_cinema_test && PGPASSWORD=laocinema_dev createdb -h localhost -U laocinema lao_cinema_test && npm run db:migrate:test
